name: betty
image_sub: I'm that short. Cry about it
look:
She was meant to be unlikeable, that's why she looks so... questionable.

She has black hair with a heart-shaped bit floating above it (this one can break and fix itself), blue eyes and uhh... skin-colored skin, I don't know how to describe it.

She wears this coffee colored... "cold shoulder top" thingy with a cute drawing of a bunny sleeping on it (or is it a dog? we will never know...), some low waisted #0699A2 shorts with white strings on them, socks are also white but I didn't want to use pure #FFFFFF for them. If you haven't noticed, I have ditched #000000 and #FFFFFF. Sad, am I right?

No, I'm not gonna wear brown contacts either.
info: She doesn't really talk much. She's shy, y'know?
She can get flustered so easily; like just call her cute once and she's already covering her face in embarrassment. She can't really take compliments that well.

She's sleepy sometimes, she might just lay anywhere she wants so she can take a rest.
  • She prefers being inside her little box for this, y'know, like a silly cat
Can she fit inside your pocket?
Her hair was meant to be messy, but I have no idea how to draw messy hair so just pretend she has messy hair.
She is addicted to brownie cakes. I think you've seen it.
This might be unbelievable but she's not really a fan of the infamous hot chocolate drink
If I ever saw her in real life I would just pour boiling water on her ngl.

Those white things coming from her eyes are meant to be her eyelashes GRAAHHH I COULDN'T MAKE THEM BLACK BECAUSE OF THE HAIR...................if i had 1 dollar for everytime someone thought she was crying i would be a millionaire
Information on her little heart thingy in her hair can be found here.
